transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries i just wanted to
make this video tonight September 30th
2014 because today is my spiritual
birthday anniversary 17 years ago today
on September 30th 1997 I was actually
sitting underneath a tree at a park
bench on my lunch break from work and
for the very first time I met Yahshua I
met Jesus the Messiah I had actually
been seeking him for about a month month
and a half leading up to that day been
really just trying to cry out to him and
try to figure out who he was and and
where where he is and what you know what
this was all about and I remembered this
day as I was sitting underneath that
tree i had my Bible open and I was
reading in Philippians and it was that
verse that said to live his Christ but
the die is gain like when i read that
verse all of a sudden this unexplainable
happened where it was like yeah
shua christ was in sight I realized that
trying to do all these things and living
up to the word of the Bible
living a good life he had nothing to do
with me and had to do with allowing him
to live in the center of homes in the
depths the very core of who I was in
letting him live through me and that
verse caused that shift it was like you
know my countenance have been so filled
with despair and hopelessness and just
crushed in the weeks leading up to that
day and then all of a sudden my
continent countenance just changed I
mean just dramatically glow just filled
my face and I knew I had finally met the
Messiah I'd finally met Jesus and for
the next 17 years he has been faithful
to guide me closer and closer and closer
to him so I just wanted to make this
video because 17 years ago this very day
September 30th 1997 I met yasho is my
spiritual birthday and I think it's
always important to remember that this
year you know September 30th happens to
fall now we're beginning the seventh day
of off so we're only three days away
from you
so I thought it was appropriate to do
that and also it's been 17 years and
anyone who's been watching my videos
knows how important i hold that number
17 because in scripture if you do a
scriptural study 17 is always a symbolic
of victory of overcoming of victory and
in fact that's what this song is about
that's playing in the background is
about victory over coming so hallelujah
I wanted to make this video to as a
spiritual dedication to Yahshua of
course and also to uplift any of you out
there to remember to commemorate when
you first met Yahshua when you first
surrendered your heart to him and you
finally were filled with his presence is
spirit that's important and if you
haven't met him yet it's the most
important decision you'll ever make so
what better time to do it and then in
the season between yom teruah pointing
toward the resurrection yom kippur which
is all about atonement this is daniel
john lee with tour restoration
ministries
happy spiritual birthday to me 17 years
ago
